name: 22squared
description: 22squared is one of the nation’s top independent advertising agencies. They blend smarts, leadership, and creative talent to give rise to decisive action and positive impact across business and culture. They are privileged to partner with some of the most recognized and iconic brands around, including AdCouncil, Baskin-Robbins, Dunkin’ Donuts, Publix Super Markets Inc., Southeast Toyota Distributors, and The Home Depot,among others.
